LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.label: SVU OTs-03 德拉古诺夫狙击步枪
LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.description: The OTs-03 SVU is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. High damage, long range and very good accuracy。
LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_DragunovSVU.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.label: VSS “螺纹裁切器”狙击步枪
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.description: Special forces sniper rifle VSS Vintorez。
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_Vintorez.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.label: M42A 狙击步枪
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.description: The M42A Scope Rifle is an American-made semi-automatic sniper rifle chambered for 7.62x51mm NATO ammunition. It is employed as the primary sniper weapon of the United States Colonial Marine Corps。
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_M42A_USCM.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.label: 瓦尔特 WA 2000 狙击步枪
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.description: Limited edition olden days sniper rifle. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate。
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RF_Gun_WA2K.tools.2.label: muzzle
